typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQlsource1
AzureSQlsource1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_code as string,
		Bureau_of_Meteorology_station_number as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Day as integer,
		Maximum_temperature_Degree_C as double,
		Days_of_accumulation_of_maximum_temperature as integer,
		Quality as string,
		weatherdate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
